# Upgrade Your Institution with Human Anatomy VR

**Why Choose Human Anatomy VR?** - Utilize a comprehensive and highly detailed anatomical XR tool, trusted and adopted by **top universities**, healthcare organizations, and professionals in over *180 countries*.

**Key Features:**

- **Interactive Learning:** Host multi-user, cross-platform sessions with up to 100 participants. 
{1022341832369269}

- **Advanced DICOM Imaging:** Transform CT/MRI scans into 3D models with our VR DICOM module. 
{1058954758917488}

- **Extensive Anatomy Library:** Explore 15 body systems and over 13,000 anatomical structures.
{1418662452153040}

- **Ant-Mode:** Allows you to shrink down in size up to 40x and observe the human body from a completely different perspective.
{1409897293028158}

**And much more!**

- **3D Cadaver Images:** Access a vast collection for realistic study created in cooperation with Stanford University. 
- **Detailed Bone Mapping:** Includes 5000 bony features for in-depth study.
- **Microanatomy Models:** 21 detailed models with explanatory information.
- **Dynamic Animations:** Over 500 movement animations for a better understanding of body mechanics.
- **Interactive Learning Tools:** In-app anatomy quizzes and more.

**Free Trial:** Experience full access to the application with our complimentary trial for new users.

**Introductory Pricing:** Benefit from special rates for first-time buyers.

**Upgrade now** and bring an immersive, intuitive VR tool for anatomical visualization to your institution!
